verses.verse: For the divisions <WH4256> of the doorkeepers: <WH7778> of the Korahites, <WH7145> Meshelemiah <WH4920> the son <WH1121> of Kore, <WH6981> of the sons <WH1121> of Asaph. <WH623>
Meshelemiah <WH4920> had sons: <WH1121> Zechariah <WH2148> the firstborn, <WH1060> Jediael <WH3043> the second, <WH8145> Zebadiah <WH2069> the third, <WH7992> Jathniel <WH3496> the fourth, <WH7243>
Elam <WH5867> the fifth, <WH2549> Jehohanan <WH3076> the sixth, <WH8345> Eliehoenai <WH454> the seventh. <WH7637>

Obed-Edom <WH5654> had sons: <WH1121> Shemaiah <WH8098> the firstborn, <WH1060> Jehozabad <WH3075> the second, <WH8145> Joah <WH3098> the third, <WH7992> and Sacar <WH7940> the fourth, <WH7243> and Nethanel <WH5417> the fifth, <WH2549>
Ammiel <WH5988> the sixth, <WH8345> Issachar <WH3485> the seventh, <WH7637> Peullethai <WH6469> the eighth; <WH8066> for God <WH430> blessed him. <WH1288>
Also to Shemaiah <WH8098> his son <WH1121> were sons <WH1121> born, <WH3205> who ruled <WH4474> over the house <WH1004> of their father; <WH1> for they were mighty men <WH1368> of valor. <WH2428>

The sons <WH1121> of Shemaiah: <WH8098> Othni, <WH6273> and Rephael, <WH7501> and Obed, <WH5744> Elzabad, <WH443> whose brothers <WH251> were valiant <WH2428> men, <WH1121> Elihu, <WH453> and Semachiah. <WH5565>

All these were of the sons <WH1121> of Obed-Edom: <WH5654> they and their sons <WH1121> and their brothers, <WH251> able <WH2428> men <WH376> in strength <WH3581> for the service; <WH5656> sixty <WH8346> - two <WH8147> of Obed-Edom. <WH5654>
Meshelemiah <WH4920> had sons <WH1121> and brothers, <WH251> valiant <WH2428> men, <WH1121> eighteen. <WH8083>

Also Hosah, <WH2621> of the children <WH1121> of Merari, <WH4847> had sons: <WH1121> Shimri <WH8113> the chief, <WH7218> (for though he was not the firstborn, <WH1060> yet his father <WH1> made <WH7760> him chief <WH7218>),

Hilkiah <WH2518> the second, <WH8145> Tebaliah <WH2882> the third, <WH7992> Zechariah <WH2148> the fourth: <WH7243> all the sons <WH1121> and brothers <WH251> of Hosah <WH2621> were thirteen. <WH7969>

Of these were the divisions <WH4256> of the doorkeepers, <WH7778> even of the chief <WH7218> men, <WH1397> having offices <WH4931> like <WH5980> their brothers, <WH251> to minister <WH8334> in the house <WH1004> of Yahweh. <WH3068>
They cast <WH5307> lots, <WH1486> the small <WH6996> as well as the great, <WH1419> according to their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> for every gate. <WH8179>

The lot <WH1486> eastward <WH4217> fell <WH5307> to Shelemiah. <WH8018> Then for Zechariah <WH2148> his son, <WH1121> a wise <WH7922> counselor, <WH3289> they cast <WH5307> lots; <WH1486> and his lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> northward. <WH6828>
To Obed-Edom <WH5654> southward; <WH5045> and to his sons <WH1121> the <WH624> storehouse. <WH1004>
To Shuppim <WH8206> and Hosah <WH2621> westward, <WH4628> by the gate <WH8179> of Shallecheth, <WH7996> at the causeway <WH4546> that goes up, <WH5927> watch <WH4929> against <WH5980> watch. <WH4929>

Eastward <WH4217> were six <WH8337> Levites, <WH3881> northward <WH6828> four <WH702> a day, <WH3117> southward <WH5045> four <WH702> a day, <WH3117> and for the storehouse <WH624> two <WH8147> and two. <WH8147>
For Parbar <WH6503> westward, <WH4628> four <WH702> at the causeway, <WH4546> and two <WH8147> at Parbar. <WH6503>
These were the divisions <WH4256> of the doorkeepers; <WH7778> of the sons <WH1121> of the Korahites, <WH7145> and of the sons <WH1121> of Merari. <WH4847>
Of the Levites, <WH3881> Ahijah <WH281> was over the treasures <WH214> of the house <WH1004> of God, <WH430> and over the treasures <WH214> of the dedicated things. <WH6944>

The sons <WH1121> of Ladan, <WH3936> the sons <WH1121> of the Gershonites <WH1649> belonging to Ladan, <WH3936> the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1>' households belonging to Ladan <WH3936> the Gershonite: <WH1649> Jehieli. <WH3172>
The sons <WH1121> of Jehieli: <WH3172> Zetham, <WH2241> and Joel <WH3100> his brother, <WH251> over the treasures <WH214> of the house <WH1004> of Yahweh. <WH3068>
Of the Amramites, <WH6020> of the Izharites, <WH3325> of the Hebronites, <WH2276> of the Uzzielites: <WH5817>
and Shebuel <WH7619> the son <WH1121> of Gershom, <WH1647> the son <WH1121> of Moses, <WH4872> was ruler <WH5057> over the treasures. <WH214>

His brothers: <WH251> of Eliezer, <WH461> Rehabiah <WH7345> his son, <WH1121> and Jeshaiah <WH3470> his son, <WH1121> and Joram <WH3141> his son, <WH1121> and Zichri <WH2147> his son, <WH1121> and Shelomoth <WH8019> his son. <WH1121>

This Shelomoth <WH8013> and his brothers <WH251> were over all the treasures <WH214> of the dedicated things, <WH6944> which David <WH1732> the king, <WH4428> and the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1>' households, <WH8269> the captains over thousands <WH505> and hundreds, <WH3967> and the captains <WH8269> of the army, <WH6635> had dedicated. <WH6942>
They dedicated <WH6942> some of the spoil <WH7998> won in battles <WH4421> to repair <WH2388> the house <WH1004> of Yahweh. <WH3068>

All that Samuel <WH8050> the seer, <WH7200> and Saul <WH7586> the son <WH1121> of Kish, <WH7027> and Abner <WH74> the son <WH1121> of Ner, <WH5369> and Joab <WH3097> the son <WH1121> of Zeruiah, <WH6870> had dedicated, <WH6942> whoever had dedicated <WH6942> anything, <WH3027> it was under the hand of Shelomoth, <WH8019> and of his brothers. <WH251>
Of the Izharites, <WH3325> Chenaniah <WH3663> and his sons <WH1121> were for the outward <WH2435> business <WH4399> over Israel, <WH3478> for officers <WH7860> and judges. <WH8199>

Of the Hebronites, <WH2276> Hashabiah <WH2811> and his brothers, <WH251> men <WH1121> of valor, <WH2428> one thousand <WH505> seven <WH7651> hundred, <WH3967> had the oversight <WH6486> of Israel <WH3478> beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383> westward, <WH4628> for all the business <WH4399> of Yahweh, <WH3068> and for the service <WH5656> of the king. <WH4428>

Of the Hebronites <WH2276> was Jerijah <WH3404> the chief, <WH7218> even of the Hebronites, <WH2276> according to their generations <WH8435> by fathers <WH1>' households. <WH705> In the fortieth year <WH8141> of the reign <WH4438> of David <WH1732> they were sought <WH1875> for, <WH4672> and there were found among them mighty men <WH1368> of valor <WH2428> at Jazer <WH3270> of Gilead. <WH1568>

His brothers, <WH251> men <WH1121> of valor, <WH2428> were two thousand <WH505> seven <WH7651> hundred, <WH3967> heads <WH7218> of fathers <WH1>' households, <WH4428> whom king David <WH1732> made overseers <WH6485> over the Reubenites, <WH7206> and the Gadites, <WH1425> and the half <WH2677> - tribe <WH7626> of the Manassites, <WH4520> for every matter <WH1697> pertaining to God, <WH430> and for the affairs <WH1697> of the king. <WH4428>
